data.text: @cimtrbl2 Nope.  Part of a plan. You'll have to watch the next episode of @PliticalCorrect ;)

@DeanLogic All I am saying is doesnt it seem odd that all of a sudden women everywhere are accusing men they work with of sexual harassment or rape or inappropriate whatever? Believe me I know there's alot of pigs in world but I also know many get falsely accused
@DeanLogic No offense but most men have that belief. Guess ya can't be a male slut anymore

@cimtrbl2 I hadn't seen that mentioned.  

However, if he had a habit of sleeping around with coworkers, then I bet he had the belief he could get any woman at work that he wanted.
@DeanLogic Legally speaking....predator. Thats what theyre calling them now
@DeanLogic Yes I am a woman and I said that 😅😅😅😅 ive just known many who have lied about being preyed upon bc they were pissed at a guy

@cimtrbl2 No one was saying he was a predator, but he's been accused of sexual misconduct and apparently the charges are good enough for him to get fired. I'm guessing more people knew about what happened, it was the Olympics.

@DeanLogic Just seems odd to me. So he slept around...does not make u a predator. Of course only him & accusers know real truth of the matter. Just seems like alot of ppl r jumping on this wagon lately
@cimtrbl2 Apparently he had been sleeping around with them for years.  But, then in Rio, he tried to do the same to someone who wasn't consenting.
@cimtrbl2 Narcissism = a classic trait of a sexual predator.
